Simple, yet so addicting. Ricochet is an undiscovered masterpiece. Its a real shame it doesn't get as much attention as valve's other titles, it most certainly deserves it.

I used to live in sadness, anger, depression but then came my saviour, Ricochet.
Ricochet has turned my life around completely, my Dad has come back with the milk, I've gotten 8 girlfriends, the list goes on and on.
Please, for your own sake, buy ricochet, trust me on this, it's worth it.
Best valve game to date im awaiting a sequel

Not only is this the peak of multiplayer shooters, but it is the peak of multiplayer games in general. The only reason I don’t have more hours on this game is because I am afraid I will dedicate my entire life to the gripping gameplay of Ricochet.

dead

Worst controls ever.  No mouse look (without serious rubberbanding).  No up or down aim, just straight ahead.  Luckily I didn't buy this game intentionally.  It was thrown in as part of a bundle.  Probably the only way they can get people to buy it.  Valve has some great games in their library.  This is not one of them.  I would not recommend it.

Ordan oraya zıplayıp durduğunuz oyun. Çok eski olduğu için grafikleri kötü. Türkçe dil yok ve serverleri boş. 10 dakika oynayıp bıraktım. 10.50 tl'ye arabanıza 900ml lpg alın daha çok işinize yarar. (2022 16 Nisan yakıt fiyatları için geçerli amına kodumun benzinliklerine ne zaman gitsem fiyat artıyor amk)
Una de las mejores experiencias lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda

В кавказской автошколе идут экзамены:
- Слушай, ты едешь на машине, видишь - на дороге слева молодой девушка идет, справа - старый девушка. Кого давить будишь?

I LOVE RICOCHET!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

"Ricochet" ist actiongeladenes und in der Zukunft spielendes Spiel. Es besteht darin, sich gegenseitig mit Tellern zu bewerfen. Bei diesem futuristischen Spiel werden Reflexe vom höchsten Niveau benötigt, denn manchmal fliegt Ihnen eine Scheibe direkt in die Fresse. Was mich persönlich in diesem Spiel bewegen tun, ist der Himmel, der wie eine Toiletten-Spülung ist, wenn man runter ins unendliche fliegt. Ich kann Ihnen dieses Spiel wirklich nur wärmstens empfehlen.
